data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Of The Company Dated Februray,02,2024
Unaudited Financial Result Ended 30Th September,2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations,2015, as amended (SEBI Listing Regulations)

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June,2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33, we would to like to inform you that board of director in its meeting held on 7th August,2023 consider and approved unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2023 along with limited review report which is duly recommended by audit Committee. Kindly take this same  in your records.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 29Th May, 2023
data.news_body: Dear Sir/Madam,Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today 29th May, 2023 have Consider and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company as reviewed by the Audit Committee for the quarter and financial year ended on 31st March, 2023. A copy of the said financial results along with the Audit Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company is enclosed herewith.The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 02:30 PM and concluded at 3:00 PM.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 29Th May, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today 29th May, 2023 have Consider and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company as reviewed by the Audit Committee for the quarter and financial year ended on 31st March, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Regulations 30, 33 And Other Applicable Provisions Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today i.e 17th October, 2022 have approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the half year ended on 30th September, 2022.

We enclose herewith a copy of the said financial results along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:50 P.M.

You are requested to take the above on your records and do the needful.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Half Year And Year Ended On 31* March, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today i.e. 26 May, 2022 have approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the half year and year ended on 31st March, 2022.
We enclose herewith a copy of the said financial results along with the Auditor's Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.
The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 05:00 P.M.
You are requested to take the above on your records and do the needful.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today i.e 26th May, 2022 have approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the half year and year ended on 31st March, 2022.

We enclose herewith a copy of the said financial results along with the Auditor's Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 05:00 P.M.

You are requested to take the above on your records and do the needful.

data.caption: Approval Of Unaudited Standalone Financial Results For The Half Year Ended September 30, 2021 Along With The Limited Review Report Of The Statutory Auditor
data.news_body:
In pursuance of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 we hereby submit following documents:
1. Unaudited standalone financial results for the half year ended September 30, 2021.
2. Statement of Assets and Liabilities for the half year ended September 30, 2021.
3. Limited Review report for the half year ended September 30, 2021.
You are requested to kindly take the same on your record.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 13Th November, 2021 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
With reference to the subject sited above, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Saturday, 13th November, 2021 have approved the following:

1. Un-audited standalone financial results for the half year ended 30th September, 2021.
2. Adopted the Limited Review Report as laid down by the statutory Auditor.
The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 12:00 P.M. and concluded at 12:40 P.M.

You are requested to take the above on your records and do the needful.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 28Th  June, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on today i.e 28th June, 2021 have approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the half year and year ended on 31st March, 2021.

We enclose herewith a copy of the said financial results along with the Auditor's Report by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 05:00 P.M.

You are requested to take the above on your records and do the needful.
